docs.title: Repo Template
docs.text:
A clean template to kickstart your deep learning project 🚀⚡🔥 Click on Use this template to initialize new repository.

Suggestions are always welcome!

docs.title: Description
docs.text: This is a template for you to use for any project. It has all the actions set up for you to use.

docs.title: This is an example post for blog
docs.text: This is an simple example post for blog.

docs.title: Using PIP
docs.text:
# clone project
git clone https://github.com/Mai0313/template
mv template your-repo-name

# change directory
cd your-repo-name

# [OPTIONAL] create conda environment
conda create -n myenv python=3.9
conda activate myenv

# install requirements
pip install -r requirements.txt

docs.title: Step 2: Clone the repository
docs.text:
# clone project
git clone https://github.com/Mai0313/template
mv template your-repo-name

# change directory
cd your-repo-name
